sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_176383_star_wars_talents"> <x_176383_star_wars_talents action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <description>Whenever the character heals wounds as a result of Healing Trance, if the character is suffering from a Critical Injury, he makes a Resilience check with the difficulty equal to the Critical Injury's severity rating. On a successful check, the character recovers from the Critical Injury. If the character is suffering from multiple Critical Injuries, he chooses which one to attempt to recover from.</description> <field_to_update/> <force_talent>true</force_talent> <how_much_to_add/> <name>Healing trance (improved)</name> <number>TAL0001056</number> <passive_or_active>passive</passive_or_active> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2020-01-21 23:17:31</sys_created_on> <sys_id>c7016b24db2e0c542901de90cf961965</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2020-01-21 23:17:31</sys_updated_on> <table_to_update/> </x_176383_star_wars_talents> </record_update>
